tidbits.title: Piton de la Fournaise
tidbits.description: Réunion is home to Piton de la Fournaise, one of the world's most active volcanoes, often displaying spectacular eruptions and lava flows.

tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: The island's diverse population creates a vibrant cultural tapestry, blending African, Asian, European, and Indian influences into its cuisine, music, and traditions.

tidbits.title: Unique Biodiversity
tidbits.description: Réunion's lush landscapes harbor unique biodiversity, including the cloud forest of Bebour-Belouve and an array of endemic flora and fauna found nowhere else on earth.
